Traits.Name: Blood Scent
Traits.Description: Has hatred of the closest bloodied foe. Ignores stealth and blinded against bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Finish Off
Actions.Description: The Nilfling deals a phenomenal blow to an adjacent bloodied character. That character must save or take 2[D], become dazed, and become winded. On a successful save, they only take [D] and are either dazed or winded (the nilfling can choose).
